title: Fundamentals of Corporate Credit Risk Prediction and Machine Learning Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of Statistics and Programming Principles
context.additional_context: Novice professionals in medical/legal/technical fields engaging in flexible mobile-based learning

learning_goals: Students can explain the fundamental concepts of credit risk assessment and the procedures for analyzing corporate financial data.
Students understand the basic principles of machine learning algorithms (e.g., Random Forest) and can apply them to simple datasets.
Students can critically analyze discussions on how corporate social responsibility (CSR) factors influence credit evaluations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
